title: Desi Harley versus videshi Harley: Two legends gear up to race on Indian roads
description: Hero MotoCorp has launched the X440, a 440cc bike jointly developed with Harley-Davidson. The model has a sticker price starting from Rs 2.29 lakh, making it the most affordable product in Harley-Davidson's range. The move marks Harley-Davidson's entry into the mid-weight category for two-wheelers. Although Royal Enfield, known to make the desi Harleys, continues to dominate this motorcycle segment, it may face challenges from Harley-Davidson.
